semantic_title: Interpretation of 'And' in Code Titles - Either/Or Meaning

content.full_text: The word "and" should be interpreted to mean either "and" or "or" when it appears in a title. For example, cases of "tuberculosis of bones", "tuberculosis of joints" and "tuberculosis of bones and joints" are classified to subcategory A18.0, Tuberculosis of bones and joints. (Evidence: pg no: 11, L49-L52)
content.summary: The word 'and' in code titles should be interpreted as either 'and' or 'or' for coding purposes (Evidence: pg no: 11, L49-L51)
key_concepts: And means either 'and' or 'or' (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50)
Single code covers individual or combined conditions (Evidence: pg no: 11, L51-L52)
Inclusive interpretation of conjunction (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Word 'and' in titles means either 'and' or 'or' (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50)
detailed_rules.explanation: This allows single codes to cover both individual conditions and their combinations (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50-L52)

workflow_steps: Step 2: Determine if patient has one or both conditions
Step 3: Use same code regardless of combination
Step 4: Apply to individual or combined presentations

specific_codes.description: Tuberculosis of bones and joints (Evidence: pg no: 11, L52)
specific_codes.context: Covers tuberculosis of bones, joints, or both

breakdown.A18.0: Includes bones only, joints only, or both bones and joints

code_patterns.description: Code titles with 'and' cover either or both conditions (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50)
code_patterns.explanation: Single code applies to bones only, joints only, or both

referenced_by.title: Use of 'and'
referenced_by.explanation: References this section for detailed explanation

coding_scenarios.scenario: Patient with tuberculosis affecting bones only, joints only, or both
coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Tuberculosis of left femur and right knee joint
step_by_step: Step 1: Identify tuberculosis of bones and joints
Step 2: Note A18.0 covers bones and joints
Step 4: Use A18.0 for any combination

correct_coding.rationale: A18.0 covers bones, joints, or both per 'and' interpretation rule (Evidence: pg no: 11, L52)

codes: Separate codes for bones and joints
incorrect_coding.rationale: Single code A18.0 covers all combinations
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using separate codes when single code with 'and' applies

breakdown.A18.0: Covers tuberculosis of bones, joints, or both (Evidence: pg no: 11, L52)

examples.rationale: And interpretation allows single code for individual or combined conditions (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50-L52)

best_practices: Use single code when 'and' appears in title regardless of individual or combined presentation (Evidence: pg no: 11, L50-L52)
common_mistakes: Using multiple codes when single 'and' code applies
